title: About Us
subtitle: Gutter Share Company
description: Learn more about our company, mission, and values.

overview.title: Company Overview
overview.description: Gutter Share Company is a business organization established on April 11, 2005, in accordance with the Commercial Law of Ethiopia. We are a trusted business organization serving Ethiopia since 2005, strategically located in the heart of Addis Ababa near Piassa.
overview.location: Arada Sub-City, Woreda 4, House Number Addis (Gutter Building), Addis Ababa

mission.title: Purpose of Establishment
mission.description: The main initial purpose for which the Share Company was established was to collectively build a workplace through the contributions of its shareholders, and concurrently, to engage in the business of constructing and renting out sections of the building for shops and offices. It has successfully constructed the planned Gutter Building and made it ready for service in 2014.
details: Collective workplace development through shareholder contributions
Construction and rental of commercial spaces
Providing shops and office spaces for businesses

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: In addition to its original and aforementioned purpose, since the building is located near Piassa, the heart of Addis Ababa, it has established a convenient and reliable multi-purpose hall within the building, offering comprehensive services to its users.
details: Strategic location advantage near Piassa commercial center
Multi-purpose hall facility for various events

values.title: Our Values
values.description: Our core values guide everything we do and shape our commitment to excellence.

items.title: Quality First
items.description: We prioritize quality in all our services and operations

items.title: Customer Satisfaction
items.description: Our clients' success is our primary goal

items.title: Integrity
items.description: We conduct business with honesty and transparency

items.title: Innovation
items.description: We continuously improve and adapt to meet market needs

history.title: Our History
history.description: Gutter Share Company is a business organization established on April 11, 2005, in accordance with the Commercial Law of Ethiopia. The address of Gutter Share Company is in Arada Sub-City, Woreda 4, House Number Addis (Gutter Building), located in our city of Addis Ababa.

milestones.event: Company established under Ethiopian Commercial Law
Gutter Building construction completed and ready for service
Serving clients with comprehensive business solutions

address.title: Address
address.description: Arada Sub-City, Woreda 4, House Number Addis (Gutter Building), Addis Ababa.
